summary: Project includes updating a live page to display a custom message/quote.

existing_features.title: Replace the existing hero message text on the homepage with the exact user-provided quote: “I love you with all my hearts, and i am proud of you who you are!!”.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the provided quote/message to the page: “I love you with all my hearts, and i am proud of you who you are!!”

projectName: Update homepage hero message with provided quote
